name: Avoid undocumented PeopleCode Methods (PeopleSoft)
description: PeopleCode Methods should be documented. This reports shows all PeopleCode Methods with no comments.
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the PeopleCode Methods.
remediation: Add comments into PeopleCode Methods to explain what is their goal and how they work.

qualityStandards.name: Missing Documentation for Design
qualityStandards.description: The product does not have documentation that represents how it is designed.
